scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run generate:openapi && npm run generate:spring && npm run generate:typescript-rxjs
scripts.generate:java: openapi-generator-cli generate -g java -i src/openapi.yml -o dist/java -c config/java.json
scripts.generate:spring: openapi-generator-cli generate -g spring -i src/openapi.yml -o dist/spring -c config/spring.json
scripts.generate:typescript-rxjs: openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-rxjs -o dist/typescript-rxjs -i src/openapi.yml -c config/typescript-rxjs.json
